snippet: The Central Terminal Building at La Guardia Airport, which has been derided as a “third world” eyesore, should be transformed into a grand portal that welcomes travelers, agency officials said.
abstract: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey officials say Central Terminal Building at La Guardia Airport should be rebuilt into grand portal that welcomes travelers into unified airport; delays selecting which developer will be awarded $4 billion contract.
lead_paragraph: The Central Terminal Building at La Guardia Airport, which has been derided as a “third world” eyesore, should be transformed into a grand portal that welcomes travelers, agency officials said.

headline.main: Port Authority Delays Picking Builder for a Terminal at La Guardia
headline.print_headline: Agency Delays Picking Builder for a Terminal at La Guardia

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
